text: Schaufuss or Schaufuß is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Hans Joachim Schaufuß (1918-1941), German actor *Hans Hermann Schaufuß (1893-1982), German actor *Ludwig Wilhelm Schaufuss (1833–1890), German natural scientist *Peter Schaufuss (born 1949), Danish ballet dancer *Puk Schaufuss, born Liselotte Schaufuss, (born 1943), Danish actress
title: Schaufuss
